thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Julia in California
thread.title_full: Kiwi Sheepskins reviewed by Julia in California

author: Julia in California
title: Julia in California
text:
The Company handled a lost order quickly and sent me a replacement which arrived the following week. They were patient, respectful and did all they could to make the process as easy on me as possible.
I've done business with them twice now and I have only positive things to say about the company and their products!
